title: The Impossible
creator_credit: Summit Entertainment, Apaches Entertainment, Canal+ España, ICAA, Institut Valenciã de Cinematografia (IVAC), Mediaset España, La Trini, Generalitat Valenciana, Telecinco Cinema, Sparka Lee Hall, Álvaro Augustín, Belén Atienza, Ghislain Barrois, J. A. Bayona, Sergio G. Sánchez, Maria Reyes and Anna Bingemann
headline_credit: Spain and United States of America, 2012
brief_description: In December 2004, close-knit family Maria, Henry and their three sons begin their winter vacation in Thailand only for the devastating Indian Ocean tsunami to strike.

constellations_other.name: Representing disasters
constellations_other.description: The devastating Indian Ocean tsunami was captured by many people on personal devices and home cameras, with the footage broadcast to the world. The event also inspired feature films that are part of a long tradition of disaster films, which often push the boundaries of VFX.

creator_credit_for_label: Summit Entertainment, Apaches Entertainment, Canal+ España, ICAA, Institut Valenciã de Cinematografia (IVAC), Mediaset España, La Trini, Generalitat Valenciana, Telecinco Cinema, Sparka Lee Hall, Álvaro Augustín, Belén Atienza, Ghislain Barrois, J. A. Bayona, Sergio G. Sánchez, Maria Reyes and Anna Bingemann
description: In December 2004, close-knit family Maria, Henry and their three sons begin their winter vacation in Thailand. But the day after Christmas, the idyllic holiday turns into an incomprehensible nightmare when a terrifying roar rises from the depths of the sea, followed by a wall of black water that devours everything in its path. Though Maria and her family face their darkest hour, unexpected displays of kindness and courage ameliorate their terror.
description_for_label: In December 2004, close-knit family Maria, Henry and their three sons begin their winter vacation in Thailand. But the day after Christmas, the idyllic holiday turns into an incomprehensible nightmare when a terrifying roar rises from the depths of the sea, followed by a wall of black water that devours everything in its path. Though Maria and her family face their darkest hour, unexpected displays of kindness and courage ameliorate their terror.
